summary: The Photographer is an elusive serial killer operating in modern-day Moscow. He leaves numbered tiles at the scenes of his crimes, similar to those placed at crime scenes by forensic teams.... See full summary Â»
cast: Tomasz Kot|Sonia Bohosiewicz|Adam Woronowicz|Agata Buzek|Tatyana Arntgolts|Aleksandr Baluev|Elena Babenko|Vadim Afanassiev|Georgi Angielow|Oleg Bakhrutdinov|Margarita Baraniuk|Edwin Bazanski|Artur Chamski|Siergiej Darij|Karolina Dryzner|Katarzyna Dworak|Nodar Dzhanelidze|Helena Ganjalyan|Dariusz Gudzowski|Miroslaw Haniszewski|Michal Idzik|Karol Kadlubiec|Pawel Karolak|Andrey Kostash|Andriej Kostash|Aleksandr Koval|Sergiej Kriuczkow|Hubert Kulacz|Evklid Kyurdzidis|Marta Lacka|Elena Leszczynska|Andriej Lyko|Janusz Machowicz|Eugeniusz Malinowski|Waldemar Razniak|Sasza Reznikow|Radomir Rospondek|Sonia Roszczuk|Wojciech Solarz|Igor Stepanov|Tomasz Szulecki|Artem Tereshczenk|Artyom Tkachenko|Wieslaw Wasylewicz|Ilja Zmiejew
title: Fotograf
